pages.text: $(bold)Player Effects$() grant you $(important)passive status effects$() while you're holding the jeweled item!$(br2)These effects act like potions, but remain active as long as you hold the item.

pages.title: Available Effects
pages.text: $(li)Night Vision - See in the dark$(li)Aqua Affinity - Breathe underwater$(li)Swiftness - Move faster$(li)Haste - Mine/attack faster$(li)Resistance - Take less damage$(li)Regeneration - Heal over time$(li)Leaping - Jump higher$(li)Fire Resistance - Immune to fire

pages.title: How They Work
pages.text: $(important)Hold the item$() in your main hand or off-hand to receive the effect!$(br2)Effects last as long as you hold the item. Switch items and the effect fades after a few seconds.$(br2)Higher levels = stronger effects!

pages.title: Pro Tips
pages.text: $(li)Create specialized tools for different situations$(li)Keep a Night Vision pickaxe for cave mining$(li)Use Aqua Affinity for ocean monuments$(li)Carry a Fire Resistance tool for the Nether$(br2)$(o)Tools that buff you passively!$()
